ST20250225-202584800731-Lim Yaohui-Angelica Ang-aapoke01/ Mr Eshpal Mann, (wearing turban) 33, sports commentator, playing Pokémon cards during tournament at Goodness Gracious Games on Feb 25, 2025. Since the lockdowns during the Covid-19 pandemic, there has been a global resurgence in interest in Pokémon trading cards - which were all the rage in the late 1990s and early 2000s. The trend has likewise reached Singapore's shores, manifesting a spike in Pokémon card scams in the Republic. A 1000-strong crowd also prematurely shut down the launch of the latest card set at Jewel's Pokémon Centre in Jan 2025. ST speaks with three local trading card stores, and Pokémon card collectors and players, to discuss the reasons behind the cards' return to the spotlight, and how it may affect them. (ST PHOTO: LIM YAOHUI)
